formElement.label: Output Property:
formElement.documentation: The property that results will be returned into.

formElement.label: Location Type:
formElement.documentation: Location to create in (for this procedure this must be 'Repository', to create in other locations use procedure CreateInOther instead)

formElement.label: Change Package ID:
formElement.documentation: Object to create: object change package ID (applies to object types ChgPkg, PScheme, and ReadyLst)

formElement.label: Object Name:
formElement.documentation: Object to create: object name (applies to object types AProfile, CConfig, Exits, Scheme, TFGroup, and TFRule)

formElement.label: Serialized Resource Object Criteria:
formElement.documentation: Additional objects(s) to create: XML serialized list of resource object criteria created using procedure SerializeOtherObjectCriteria (optional, the object specified below is appended to this)
formElement.htmlDocumentation:
<input name="Add" style="color: #ffffff;padding: 3px 15px 3px 15px;border: none;font-size:14px;height: 48px;min-width: 150px;background: #3e99df;" value="Add criteria" onclick='

            var $otValue = document.getElementsByName("ObjType")[0].value;
            var $onValue = document.getElementsByName("ObjName")[0].value;
            var $cpValue = document.getElementsByName("CPID")[0].value;
            var $ot="<ObjType>".concat($otValue).concat("</ObjType>\n");
            var $on="<ObjName>".concat($onValue).concat("</ObjName>\n");
            var $cp="<CPIDName>".concat($cpValue).concat("</CPIDName>\n");
            document.getElementsByName("ObjectCriteria")[0].value = ""
            .concat($otValue.length===0?"":$ot)
            .concat($onValue.length===0?"":$on)
            .concat($cpValue.length===0?"":$cp);
            document.getElementsByName("ObjType")[0].value="";
            document.getElementsByName("ObjName")[0].value="";
            document.getElementsByName("CPID")[0].value="";
            ' type=button />

formElement.label: Name-Value Pairs:
formElement.documentation: Name-value pairs to set in the object being created, one per line in NAME=VALUE format
